about_the_game:
Welcome to the endless temple of GRUEL. Get wacky weapons, destroy freaky creatures and collect massive amounts of gold! In this first-person boomer-shooter its time to say goodbye to your basic ways of tactical gunman-ship and embrace the CHAOS!



In the temple of GRUEL, nothing is certain. Who knows what room comes next? On top of that, the temple is ENDLESS! That means you can get ∞ amounts of gold! So gain as much treasure from the temple as you possibly can, and let you top the charts!



To guard the amazing treasures you can find, there are hordes of monsters that just came out of the radiated freaks factory for you to pummel into oblivion! But they will not go down without a fight. From floating jellyfish to psycho magicians. We got them all!



To defeat those crazy freaks, we will need guns. Tons of them. Luckily, our dealer just got us a ton of bargain bin weapons ready to use. They break, They don't have a ton of ammo, but they can shoot fish, prism shards, acid or even.. coins?! Get creative with this big arsenal of innovative throw-away weaponry! But do not forget your biggest gun, your kick!



Is the temple rough on you? No worries, we have the BIGGEST, GREATEST artifacts inside of our rooms to help you defeat everything in your path with ease! They will improve your ability to do almost anything! It will bring you even deeper into the temple!!



Enjoy this hand-crafted aesthetic and watch some crazy abominations come to life!

GRUEL is not responsible for any harm to your mental status because of your opinion on fish as bullets.

name: GRUEL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or upwards
  • Processor: Intel core i3 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 745
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or upwards
  • Processor: Intel core i5 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Go on a rampage in this endless arcade Boomer-Shooter! Gain the weirdest weapons and destroy all the monsters in the never-ending temple of GRUEL!
supported_languages: English, Russian, Italian, Dutch, Spanish - Latin America
